text: A Wetterhoun (West Frisian: "Wetterh√ªn" English: "Water dog") is a type of water dog breed that came from the Friesland province of the Netherlands. It was originally used as a hunting dog. The population is small which could threaten the breed. == Health == Even though it is a very rare breed, it is still generally healthy. Hip evaluation, elbow evaluation, and Severe Combine Immune Deficiency Syndrome tests are recommend for the breed. == Temperament == The breed is a little stubborn, but it usually stable. == References == Category:Frisian culture Category:Dog breeds originating in the Netherlands Category:Rare dog breeds Category:FCI breeds
title: Wetterhoun
